Text:
I fixed the issue with Episode 5 being from "The Mentalist" - it's now the real deal ;).
All Episodes are "Being Human" Season 4!

Usually konashine is the guy for season packs in 720p.
If he doesn't put it up you'll have to download the 720p episodes individually, I'm afraid.
Netflix only has the first 3 seasons (ugh), and I don't want to wait another 100 years for Netflix to add it, so this is much appreciated.  Thanks.

the problem is that i don't know what to download.
it seems that all episodes after 5-th have audio issues

^^ Regarding any issues:
The files are fine, I have no problems (audio or video) watching them whatsoever.
Just use VLC to watch.
why the hell are the second half MP4's? my player wont play that shit, the first 4 eps were alright, sound was shite tho, and i can't watch the second half.

@mulletboy:
Get VLC and you won't have to whine anymore ;)
yes, that would be fine, except that i wish to watch them with my wife, on the tv, not on the computer. i have sourced the others elsewhere now, i just need ep 6 as a decent file type.

@mullet and anyone else complaining that it's not convenient.  SHUTUP!  You know your issue, fix it.  If there is nothing wrong with the download, say THANKS!

@manOtor THANKS!!!
